Our tour in Gyeongju ended a little earlier than anticipated and we were not able to get an earlier ride back to Seoul, they were sold out. We just chilled at Sin Gyeongju station. There's some shops and a couple of restaurants. KTX is awesome!Great system for the price and quite fast as most have already noted.Also connected to major metro stations for easy access to subways.The average speed is about 300km/h or more between Seoul and Busan.However, there is always a strange slowdown around Sejong City.Probably would cut travel time by ~15m if this slowdown doesn't happen.Fast, clean and efficient way to travel in Korea. Seoul to Daegu is about 2 hours. On a busy weekend, you might want to get a ticket in advance, or else you might end up with standing room only, which means standing in the area between the cars near the bathroom - not a fun way to spend a few hours.Easy to find the train and the train is clean and the seat is comfortable.Ready your tickets early as i can see the train is fully booked.The ticket is not cheap but for me is an experience because of the movie - Train to Busan.KTX is the best way to travel long distances in Korea. Its better than by air as it leaves from the middle of Seoul and lands in the middle of your destination in the city you are visiting. Very comfortable and free wi fi. Ideal if travelling to BusanWe bought the KR Pass, 4-day flexible pass. You can book one month in advance in their website.Went to Busan, Daegu, Daejeon and back to Seoul.It convenient, hassle-free and fast.Traveling with KTX train is always one of my favorite public transport to Busan/Gyeongju and etc, Pros:- The train seating for second class is comfortable, and clean. Staff over the counter is helpful, as i need to change earlier train schedule from Pohang to Busan to avoid long waiting inside the station. They manage to help me change without any problem on the day itself.Seoul airport is easy to get around. The automatic ticket machines are easy to use but there is a ticket desk near the entrance if you need help. It’s a quick trip into the city and you pay more for reserved seats. I used this service for my first trip and used the standard service for my other 3 trips.My guess very cheep, in Japan 3-4 times more.also,much easy to use than metro in Korea.In Seoul is for me is nuts.

Name: 서울메트로
Review: 세계 여러 도시의 지하철을 이용해 보았습니다.그 중 최고는 단연 우리나라 지하철이라고 생각합니다.시설, 빠르기, 접근성, 편의성 등 모든 것을 따져도 세계 최고입니다. 화장실을 무료로 편리하게 이용하는 것도 장점이죠.단지 한마디 더 한다면 파업을 줄여 주셨으면 하는 바람입니다.물론 어쩔수없는 선택인 줄은 알지만 시민들을 위해서요.대한민국 지하철 시스템은 뭐 세계 최상급 아닌가 싶습니다. 여러 나라 여행해봤지만 대한민국보다 좋았던 적은 없었던것 같아요 ^^;어느 도시를 여행해도 서울 지하철만큼 정확하고 대부분의 장소가 연결되는 곳은 못본것 같습니다. 가격도 다른 국가에 비해 상당히 저렴하고요!편리하고 안전한 교통수단 입니다.앱을 이용하면 환승도 쉽게 확인가능 합니다.서울을 방문한다면 서울 메트로를 이용하세요.서울의 지하철은 안전성 청결도 편의성 측면에서 세계최고이다. 물론 출퇴근 시간대는 사람니 너무 많이 타 복잡해서 힘들지만 그 시간대만 벗어나면 쾌적한 편이다. 버스와 환승이 되기 때문에 무척 편리하다해외 몇번 다녀오니 우리 지하철이 얼마나 좋은지 깨달았다. 뉴욕, 파리,델리, 런던 마드리드, 리우데자네이루 등 여러 도시들에서 지하철 경험이 있지만 어떤곳은 좁고 비싸고.. 화장실에서나 날법한 냄새가 나는곳도 있고, 여성전용칸이 있는곳도 있었다. 하지만 서울처럼 카드한방에 끝! 언제 오는지 딱딱 알려주는 곳은 없었어요.대체로 쾌적하고 여유로운 지하철 이용이 가능하며 환승의 경우 주위 시민들에게 도움을 청하면 친절한 답변을 들을 수 있습니다.주말엔 너무 복잡해 힘들때도 많아요ㅜㅜ하지만 때론 버스보다 빠르고 환승하면 가까울때가 많아 자주이용합니다.신분당선 추가요금이 비싸게도 느껴지지만 외곽으로 갈때도 좋아요^^환승 시스템, 청결도 최고! 늘 깨끗하고 안전하게 이용 하고 있어요~ 자부심을 가지게 할 만한 서울 메트로 최고입니다~ 짱짱짱짱서울지역 대부분을 다닐 수 있고 시간도 빠르고 정확한 교통수단이죠.요금도 저렴하고 차량도 깨끗하고 안전하게 운행되는 것같아요.

Name: 동대문 밀리오레
Review: 各フロアは同じようなお店が<U+4E26>んでいます。一度上のレストランにいったんですが一人もお客さんもおらず閑散としておりすごく古い雰<U+56F2><U+6C17>で、東南アジアのフ<U+30FC>ドコ<U+30FC>トかと思いました。少し怖かったです。値段の交<U+6E09>が必要ですが、明洞、南大門に比べ基本それほど高くはないと思います。14階のクイックマッサ<U+30FC>ジに行きたかったのですが、月曜日は定休日だからか入り口が露店で封鎖されており中には入れなそうでした。グッドモ<U+30FC>ニングシティの9階にもマッサ<U+30FC>ジがあり、そこで買い物の疲れをほぐしてもらいました^_^東大門で深夜まで買い物しても安心な場所にあり便利です。<U+99C5>も近く東大門で遊ぶならオススメです。フロントの階にマッサ<U+30FC>ジ店もあります。部屋は<U+72ED>いですが、<U+5BDD>るだけだったので問題ありませんでした。金曜日と土曜日<U+7D9A>けていきました。この<U+8FBA>り一<U+5E2F>、土曜日は閉店時間が早かったです。特に欲しい物はなかったのですが、パジャマやTシャツ、アクセサリ<U+30FC>などがリ<U+30FC>ズナブルな<U+4FA1>格で購入できる上、値段交<U+6E09>で更にお安くなりました。どのフロアも同じような店ばかりですが、深夜まで遊ぶにはもってこいのエリアです。周りの道路沿いにたくさんのお店がありますが、そこより安いですよ。とくにティシャツはこちらで購入した方が安いです。いつも５階のピアスを購入しに行きます。デザインも素敵だしやすくしてくれます。明るい時間<U+5E2F>にデザインプラザ側から見たミリオレ。ド<U+30FC>ンとそびえ立つ外<U+89B3>は東大門ファッションビル郡の象<U+5FB4>らしい貫<U+7984>があります。それと同時に老朽化も感じました。一階フロアの商品は隣のaPMとよく似ているためどっちで買ったのか忘れてしまうことがよくあります。上階にネイル材料が買えるフロア<U+30FC>があるので行きました。日本よりもかなり安く品質も<U+60AA>くないです。韓<U+56FD>ならではのオマケをもらいました。値引き交<U+6E09>はしませんでしたが、お安いのでいいかなぁって感じです。日本<U+4FA1>格の1/3ぐらいでしょうか。おススメスポットです。東大門にある大きなショッピングビルです。<U+6BCE>日長時間開いているのがびっくりです。全<U+4F53>的は若い人向きのファッションが多かったです。ネイルのフロアもあります。冬マイナス10度の時、東大門にいたときは、寒さでミリオレに逃げ<U+8FBC>みました。活<U+6C17>もあり、夜に遊べる<U+697D>しいところです。周りのファッションビルは<U+663C>間は閉まってることが多いけど　ここは<U+663C>もやってるから入りやすい。どちらかというとデパ<U+30FC>ト感<U+899A>で使える。東大門のほんとの魅力は夜だけど　<U+663C>間も買い物したいひとは便利。

Name: 뷰티플렉스 명동
Review: 訪問したのは、<U+6570>年前になります。お店のリ<U+30FC>フを貰いました。接客してくれたのは、背が低めの可愛らしい女性の方でした。少し値のはるパックがあり、他のお店が、この店<U+8217>よりも安ければ、値切ると言ってくれたり(<U+5B9F>際、このお店が1番安かったです)、オマケも<U+6CA2>山つけてくれましたし、誠意を感じました。胎盤のパックをほぼ<U+5F37>制的に購入しました。。たしかによい商品ではありますが、韓<U+56FD>の接客には疑問を感じます。<U+9045>くなってしまいすみません。２～３年前に日本のテレビ放送で取り上げられた時は、それなりに接客は良かったのですが２０１３年１月に訪問した際、接客態度の<U+60AA>さが目立ちしつこいほど自社オリジナル商品をゴリ押しされました。人もまばらで中<U+56FD>人ですら近寄らなかったので、ここはとてもお<U+52E7>め出<U+6765>ないお店です。入った途端に、ゆっくり見たいのに店員がべったり！！しかも高いものばかりすすめてきて、いらない！！とゆうとムスッと<U+30FB><U+30FB><U+30FB>そして選ぶ余裕もなく商品を推し進めてくる！！１５０００ウォン購入だったのですが支<U+6255>の時、カ<U+30FC>ド支<U+6255>いをしたかったのに、カ<U+30FC>ドをきる前に、店員がレジを打ってしまったもようで、２００００ウォン以上じゃないとカ<U+30FC>ドはダメと言われ。それならそうで、情報として、クレジットの欄に書いておくべき！！まあ、店には一人もお客はいませんでした。何度か店前を通りましたがその時も、客の出入りも少なかった。。。そして、どこのコスメショップにいってもサンプルがついていたのに、サンプルサ<U+30FC>ビスも<U+60AA>い<U+30FB><U+30FB><U+30FB>。<U+6B8B>念なお店でした。店のサ<U+30FC>ビス(??)でやってるホテルデリバリ<U+30FC>は、適<U+5F53>過ぎる手書きのメモだけでやってるせいでトラブルに<U+5DFB>き<U+8FBC>まれた。そのせいで最終日は店側のミスなのにも<U+95A2>わらず、せっかくの旅行が丸一日無<U+99C4>になった。警察沙汰の犯人扱いされた。せっかくの旅行中にトラブルに<U+5DFB>き<U+8FBC>まれたくないなら、行かない方が身のため。思い出は台無しだし、深く心が傷ついた。最終日にバラマキ土産用のシ<U+30FC>トパックをたくさん購入しました。セジョン（世宗）ホテルに近い「ビュ<U+30FC>ティプレックス」でダ<U+30FC>マル（DERMAL）10枚パックが6個で2万Wでした。自分で種類を選びたいのに「オススメ」と言いながら欲しくないものをどんどんカゴに入れて行く店員さん（笑）要らないモノは要らない、と自分で選らんで買った方がいいです！不要と言ったはずなのに、<U+5E30><U+56FD>して袋を開けると、私が選らんでいない「ワイン」のシ<U+30FC>トパックがなんと2個も！欲しかったEGFとコラ<U+30FC>ゲンは入っていませんでした<U+301C>Σ（<U+FF9F>д<U+FF9F>lll）店員さんの勢いに<U+4E57>せられないようにご注意ください（笑）

Name: 신라면세점
Review:
ク<U+30FC>ポンをお得に活用すると、ほぼタダで商品を購入することができました！ありがたい！いつまでも<U+7D9A>いて欲しいです。いつ行っても中<U+56FD>人<U+89B3>光客で混み合ってます。
日本人<U+89B3>光客向けの特典が色<U+3005>用意されてるので
事前に情報を調べてから行かれる...더 보기タクシ<U+30FC>代補助(商品券で還元)、<U+6765>店しただけでもらえるポイント、事前に登<U+9332>が必要な<U+4F1A>員限定ポイントなど、特典がかなり充<U+5B9F>...더 보기いろいろなク<U+30FC>ポンがあるので、かなりお得に買い物できますが、使いこなすのには新羅免<U+7A0E>店のサイトなどを熟<U+8AAD>する必要がありま...더 보기<U+6BCE>回「遠い」というのを理由にネットで買い物をしていて、ソウル店には行っていませんでしたが、久<U+3005>に伺いました。
行きはタク...더 보기<U+6570>年前は<U+6C17>づかなかったですが
ネットで事前に購入、空港受け取りが出<U+6765>て
便利になってました！
ネットで購入空港受け取りを...더 보기個人旅行でいくときは必ず行っています。
JALのカ<U+30FC>ドを持ってると特典があったり、ネットで事前購入したりするとギフトカ...더 보기土曜日の午前中に行きましたが、人が多く、ゆっくりお買い物ができる感じでは無かったです。
中心部からは少し離れていますが、...더 보기タクシ<U+30FC>で行くとタクシ<U+30FC>分の割引券をもらえます。<U+5E30>りは無料のバスが明洞などの方面へでているので不便さは感じません。しかし...더 보기キャンペ<U+30FC>ンで
<U+6CA2>山ポイントを貰いました♪
ポイントで化粧品を購入出<U+6765>て嬉しいです。
ただ天井が低く解放感は無いです。
...더 보기

Name: 동대문 쇼핑몰
Review: 東大門<U+7DCF>合市場の近くにはいろんなショッピングエリアがあります。東大門で今人<U+6C17>な<U+85AC>局や、スポ<U+30FC>ツストア、デパ<U+30FC>トなどを紹介したいと思います。手芸好きでなくても、心が踊る場所でした。<U+983C>まれた物を買いに行ったのですが、<U+6C17>づけば自分用の物ばかり。凄く安いので、買い物が<U+697D>しめましたよ。日曜日は、ほとんどのお店がお休みでした。市場ですが、1個から購入できる商店も多いです。今回は友人おすすめの地下のバックフロアに行って買い物してきました。時間と<U+4F53>力があれば他のフロアも<U+6C17>になるなと思いました。土曜日は休業は日曜日だけと聞いていたので土曜日に行きましたがその日は休みでした。韓<U+56FD>のファッションが好きで東大門での買い物を<U+697D>しみにしてました。友達とお<U+63C3>いのバッグを買いたかったのですが在庫が無く、12時に入荷すると言われ先にお金を<U+6255>い、12時にお店に行ったら一個しか無く、結局お金を返され、欲しかった<U+9784>も一個しか買えず、入荷しないのなら、お金を<U+6255>う前に言って欲しかったです。服やアクセなどバラマキ用のお土産を買うならここでいいでしょう。特にレザ<U+30FC>製品はクオリティ高いのでおすすめです。布など、手芸や服飾系の趣味や仕事の方には良いところだと思います。ものすごい<U+6570>の店で、主に布、布製品の材料を扱ってます。全<U+4F53>的に怪しげなのですが、いろいろあって、見てるのは面白いと思います。ユザワヤが好きな人にはおススメです。アクセサリ<U+30FC>を作る人は是非5階に行ってみると良い。金<U+5C5E>からガラス<U+30FB>革製品まで無いものは無い。作ったことの無い人も作りたくなる。お盆の時期だったので韓<U+56FD>でも市場は休みの所も多くありましたが12日の早朝からopen!市場はとても<U+5E83>くアクセサリ<U+30FC>パ<U+30FC>ツや<U+96D1>貨パ<U+30FC>ツなど細かなモノ好きにはたまらない場所です。南大門市場と比較される東大門市場。<U+98F2>食店が多いように感じました。日曜日のお<U+663C>に行ったので開いてないお店が多かったです。行くなら夜が良いと思います。自分的には南大門市場の方が良かったと思います。夜にショッピング街になる街と聞いてはいたのですが、夕方17時ころに訪れたところ本<U+5F53>に何も開いてなくて人影もまばら。夜というのは20時以降みたいです。

Name: 반포대교
Location: 서울 350 Dongjak-daero, Banpobon-dong, Seocho-gu Moonlight Rainbow Fountain (우) 06500
Review: Quite a distance walking from express bus terminal metro station, anyway it is worth it watching the light shower where water jets coming out from side of the bridge. The timing of shows are 7.30pm, 8pm, 8.30pm, 9pm. Each show lasts around 20mins. There are some food stalls nearby where you can get a quick snack. Restaurants and cafes are also available.If you want to get a better view of the entire Banpo bridge go to the hanging cafe on the Dongjak bridge, you will see steams of colored water. If you want to see it up close, take the #9 line and exit at the express bus terminal, follow the signs and you will walk about 20 minutes along Banpo-daero until you find the entrance to go under the bridge, follow the signs that say floating island and walk another 10 minutes to Banpo Hangang Park. Make sure to check for schedule of shows. When we went there there were only 3 20 minute shows starting at 8 pm every 1/2 hour. From here you can walk to the man-made floating islands to watch the colorless steams of water and the bright colored lights underneath. I recommend 1 to 2 hours mostly because it takes time to get there.I loved this area! Went on a Friday night, watched the show which was very relaxing! Then walked over through all the other buildings, and a night market with food trucks! I think its worth seeing, and ita free!Nice parc, perfect for strolls. At night, the bridge has a light show. It just misses music but it’s a nice show. It’s best to see it when it is really dark.The light show was quite average and certainly not worth the 30 minute bus journey we took to get there. It was not really a ‘show’ but just coloured lights on the side of the bridge.Definitely worth going to if you’re in walking distance but not worth going to if you have a longer journey.Good times don’t need to be expensive. Come here for a night out. Bring a friend along. Sit down on the stairs, or bring a blanket. Grab some snacks and drinks from the local food truck. Enjoy the colorful water fountain show. Afterwards, walk to the floating islands. Take in the summer air, the colorful lights. Enjoy yourself. Time spent here is quite magical.I went there with high expectations and was a bit disappointed. It wasn't as colorful as i imagined, it was just a really long water fountain.The park near it was nice to hang out at night though. Lots of food stalls are open and there are live performances too.. . . is how one tour guide accurately describes this attraction. We walked from the JW Marriott Seoul and were less than impressed -- but the Banpo Hangang Park is lovely for sitting out on a cool Seoul evening.It's great for picnic on Spring or Fall. You can enjoy the fountain also at night, but it's only beautiful after the sunset. Luckily there was a firework when I visited the bridge, so it's mire beautiful.The descriptions make it seem like a place you really want to go, but I was disappointed when I saw the 'show'. They play music and the fountain moves up and down a bit and does a wave pattern and that's pretty much it. You can barely see the coloured lights. I loved the buildings on the other side of the road, though. They change colours too and look beautiful.

Name: 서울이스케이프룸 - 강남2호점
Rank: 3위(285곳의 서울 소재 즐길 거리 / 게임 중)
Review: The room was very intricate and detailed, with lots of different types of clues. The staff were very helpful. We had a great time!Had a great time doing the Gambler room. Excellent puzzles! Would a hundred percent recommend! Go for itGood fun!! Would recommend to come here if you're in Gangnam. Some things in Korean but easy to do if only English speakerFirst time trying an escape room. Great experience, challenging but definitely achievable. Fun with friends!We had a great time at the escape room! Very fun! Definitely do this if in Gangnam for fun or with your coworkers!I had a really good time here the room is so good and the theme is too really nice ! I recommend it if you want to have a good time ! For the torture you have to be prepared !We had a so great time, Here's a variety stories and lots of levels which you can choose freely. I'm so sure that you'll have a wonderful time.recommend!!!I've been escaping a lot, but I've never been out of this much fun! If you come with your friends, you can enjoy it!It's spectacular. interior is fantastic.I felt like James Bond for an hour.I love it. Thank you for seoul escaperoomCame here with several friends, was a blast! Was very tense and an hour went by very quickly. Would definitely come again with smarter people.

Name: 네츄럴타이스파 - 역삼점
Location: 서울 강남구 논현로 425 강남구, 마이다스 빌딩 2층 (우) 06237
Review: 친구랑 같이 갔는데 들어가자마자 태국 온 느낌이 나서 좋았어요직원 분들 모두 친절하시고 마사지 받을 때 너무 세지도 약하지도 않게 뭉친 부분을 잘 풀어주시는데 진짜 시원했고요 같이 간 친구는 원래 마사지를 잘 안받는 친구인데 제가 너무 받고 싶어서 데려갔어요 걱정 좀 했었는데 받고 나서 시원하다고 좋아하니까 더 기분 좋았어요^^ 너무 만족스럽게 받고 가요~~~~~남친이랑 지나가다가 급결정해서 온거라 별기대 안했는데...너~~~무 시원하고 코스도 커플코스가따로 있어서 좋았어용담에 친구커플이랑 같이 또 방문할께용 ㅎㅎ마사지 아주 잘하고 느낌이 좋아요패키지 코스가 전신에 뭉친 근육 풀어주고 발마사도 포함이라하루종일 스트레스 받은 몸이 좋아집니다.가격도 비싸지 않는데 만족하고 돌아갑니다.친구소개로 갔던 네츄럴타이 역삼점 들어서자마자 유명연예인 싸인이 엄청 붙어있더라고요 그래서 뭔가 있다 라는 생각이 들었는데 관리들어가기전 직원들 에티튜드도 뛰어나고 마사지를 받고 영어를 너무 잘하시길래 물어보니 반얀트리 8년경력 출신의 테라피스트드라고요 정말 감동이이였습니다. 청결하고 서비스도 좋고 무엇보다 동행한친구와 둘다 완전 만족가격 서비스 가성비 갑오브갑

Name: LG 아트센터
Review: <U+99C5>直結のアクセスのとても良い劇場です。初めてでも迷わずに行けました。開演ぎりぎりに到着してしまったら、劇場のチケット<U+62C5><U+5F53>の方が私のチケット持って待っていてくれたのには感激しました。規模はあまり大きくありませんが素敵な劇場ですね。<U+99C5>三<U+99C5> 7番 出口 直結、GSタワ<U+30FC>の中にある座席<U+6570>1103席の中規模劇場です。メインホ<U+30FC>ルは3階、客席1階が5階になります。（4階ありません）メインホ<U+30FC>ルにちょっとしたカフェはありますが地下1階はレストラン街になっていてカフェや花屋もありました。1階席は1列の前にC席が備え付けの椅子ではなく普通の椅子で<U+4E26>んでいてちょっと見にくい感じでした。2列目でしたが特に問題ありません。世宗の次の日<U+6765>たので近くてよく見えます。<U+99C5>三の地下から直結の非常にアクセスいい劇場です。ホ<U+30FC>ル自<U+4F53>はそんなに大きくありませんが入ると大きな階段があり、そこに上演中の作品のポスタ<U+30FC>などが展示されます。割と傾斜のある造りですが音そんなに<U+60AA>くないので、私は好きな劇場です。地下<U+9244>の出口から直結の便利な新しいきれいな劇場。<U+8737>川さん演出の作品など日本の作品もよく上演されています。1階のステ<U+30FC>ジが目線からかなり上になるのでとても首が疲れます。５列目ぐらいが良いでしょう。3階席はかなり上になりステ<U+30FC>ジを見下ろすことになるのであまりお<U+52E7>めしません。ソウルの劇場はどこもそうですがカフェも<U+4F75>設され、地下にコンビニもあります。まわりはオフィス街なのであまり<U+98F2>食には向きません。ミュ<U+30FC>ジカルを<U+89B3><U+89A7>するため訪問しました。３階席までありますが、今回は１階で鑑賞。舞台幅など感激するにはちょうどよい大きさで、音響も<U+60AA>くなかった<U+6C17>がします。椅子が少しだけ小さい<U+6C17>がしました。もう少しだけ背もたれがしっかりしているとよかった。地下<U+9244>２<U+53F7>線<U+99C5>三<U+99C5>直結で非常に便利です。周<U+8FBA>は<U+98F2>食店、喫茶店があるオフィス街、繁華街です。地下<U+9244>の<U+99C5>から直接雨に濡れずに行かれるので便利でした。ホ<U+30FC>ルは<U+89B3>劇にはちょうどいい中程度の大きさの施設です。ただ、舞台の<U+5965>行がもう少しあればとの印象を受けました。

Name: 한국 자수 박물관
Review: ビルの1室にある小さな博物館で、規模はかなり小さいです。人がいないと閉まっていますので入口の人に開けてもらい入館します。展示物はかなり貴重な物だそうですが手芸などに興味がある人にはおすすめですが、そうでない人が行っても面白くないと思います。路地の一番<U+5965>にある刺<U+7E4D>博物館には韓<U+56FD>の人間<U+56FD><U+5B9D><U+30FB>韓<U+5C1A>洙先生がいらっしゃいます。ま、<U+5F53>番のときだけですけれど。たまたまお<U+4F1A>いできました。80<U+6B73>だそうで、日本語が本<U+5F53>にお上手でした。長生きしていただきたいです。ソウル市のボランティアの方に、ご案<U+5185>をしていただきました。中の<U+5B9F>演をされている方が、親切で、良く見せて頂く事bができました。とても、印象深く、心にのこっています。<U+96D1>居ビルの一室にある小さな小さな博物館です。事前連絡なしで行きました。入口に小さな明かりが点いているだけで中は<U+771F>っ暗でした。それでもドアを開けて<U+58F0>をかけると係員の方が出てきて電<U+6C17>を点けてくれました。展示<U+6570>は多くなく、日本語の<U+8AAC>明もないのですぐに見終わってしまいますが、手芸好きにとっては垂涎の品ばかりでした。７<U+53F7>線鶴<U+5B66><U+99C5>１０番出口から３分くらいですが、事前電話で行かれる事をお<U+52E7>めします。館長の許 東華（人文<U+5B66>博士）先生は、ご自身も彫刻家である<U+7814>究者です。日本でも韓<U+56FD>工芸の展<U+89A7><U+4F1A>や講演のを<U+6570>多く開催なさっておられます。ここでは刺<U+7E4D>のコレクションを始めポジャギなどのカタログが多く展示してあり、購入できます。個人美術館で入館の際は、入り口を管理している方に開けてもらいます。

Name: 비트포비아 신논현
Rank: 57위(285곳의 서울 소재 즐길 거리 / 게임 중)
Review: The rooms have both English and Korean. They are challenging and the staff is very nice and helpful.

Name: 메가박스 코엑스몰점
Rank: 13위(285곳의 서울 소재 즐길 거리 / 게임 중)
Review:
Excellent experience! Highly recommend going to this mall. You will have a fun time and everyone in the family will enjoy it.Megabox great cinima to visit plenty of screens and always a good selection of movies both Korean and English speaking. VIP cinimas are realy good. You pay a little extra but get reclining seats with foot stool and slipers. You can also order food and...더 보기It's about the only good thing in Coex mall. The cinema are comfy the crowd is well behaved and tons of movies to chose from .. what more could you ask for?! <U+0001F44D><U+0001F3FB>This was pretty neat being able to see a movie in Korea. The theater played English movies and the theater was in a mall!Are all popcorn in Korea movie theaters stale?  That's my only complaint and I've seen two movies in one week.Each movie theater is spacious with lots of seating. It's especially busy during the holidays but it's well worth it and it's a great location right near Gangnam. Also conveniently close to shopping malls and the subway.Pretty cool place. Lots of movies, $9 for adult tickets. Very organized establishment. Comfortable seats, clean with a handbag holder...더 보기Pros:
- Spacious theatres halls and huge projection size
- Movies have Korean subtitles, no dubbing
- Low cost (~8$/movie)...더 보기I went to COEX during the weekend and it was incredibly crowded.  The theater itself is an American style -...더 보기Megabox at COEX Mall often screens films which are not available at other cinemas in Seoul, eg., twice per week...더 보기

Name: 코엑스 아쿠아리움
Location: 서울 강남구 봉은사로 524 코엑스몰 B1 O12 (우) 06164
Review:
I make it a point to see this aquarium every time I visit Seoul. Many varieties and I like their collection of exotic shrimps. A must-see in Seoul. Great for children and adults. I usually schedule to see it when the weather is not good...더 보기Really nice aquarium . a nice place. had a lot of activities around it to. a must visit place and...더 보기COEX aquarium is interesting, but definitely catered more towards kids and families.  I like aquariums and have been to many, so I would rate this one overall as average.  Not fantastic, but a decent way to kill 2 hours if one has time to kill...더 보기The fun is in the inner areas. Navigate to see crabs and otters inside. They're amazingly huge and colourful.The visit to the COEX Aquarium in this Seoul tour has become a very good gift for me. I didn't...더 보기I paid full price for ticket 28,000 not realising there is online discount I would have paid less. It wasn’t originally on my plan of places to go but a rainy day brought me to Coex. The aquarium is really great with lots of varieties...더 보기My family very love this place!! 
It's very beautiful, especially the Mermaid Show was really amazing !Don't get me wrong - if you have kids, it's a great interactive activity.
As adults, having seen other aquariums, this is average. The exhibits are catering for children, so instead of trying to replicate natural habitats in the tanks, a lot have childish toys...더 보기My daughter soo happy in here. Many fish, and interactive features inside... for tourist, you can wear hanbok for free...더 보기Nice place for a rainy day. Very cool sea animals.
Cost 28,000 each. If you have kids they will enjoy

Name: 코엑스 센터
Review:
The best thing for me at Co-EX is the airline check in counter. Drag your baggage to the airport check in annex at Co-Ex. Done. You get a boarding pass, get rid of your baggage - all you have to do is drag your a** to the airport and off you go.This the most convenient thing I've ever seen in my life.Make sure you have ample time on the weekends if you intend to take a taxi, limousine bus, or friend driving to Inchon or Gimpo - traffic out of Gangnam area could get interesting - consider taking the train (subway).The mall has numerous eateries, and department stores. You can spend days there (which we did). Various attractions have their own reviews, so scan through them. You can easily find the gems in those reviews.Aquarium, shopping, temple, cinema, library, food centre, Sky Garden, exhibition hall, hotels, restaurants and so much more. No wonder this is a meeting place for all as you can just about do all things here. We spend almost the whole day here, shopping, dining and of course taking photos.It's a very large complex with international brands of shops, Hyundai department store with supermarket, library, restaurants, cinema, five-star hotel (Intercontinental), conference centre, aquarium, food court, City Air Terminal that can do flight check-in. Our itinerary of that day was to have a fabulous seafood lunch in Garak seafood market (metro station #817), then took 6 stops to Samseong station (#219) where COEX mall is located, strolled around for a few hours, bought some food in supermarket before taking a taxi at Intercontinental Hotel back to our hotel apartment in city centre. Very enjoyable and convenient. Worth spending half day here. A cozy and clean mall.I came here for a conference and was impressed with its size. Loads of large rooms inside used for conferences - they had about 3 on when I was there each occupying a large room and several other spaces. There’s a multitude of restaurants and places to get food. I believe they have an underground mall as well. Really clean and well kept.This venue was very near the hotel I stayed in while visiting Seoul last year. I found it a bit hard to imagine that a mall is sharing the same building as that of the convention center. Despite of its huge size, I found it easy to explore this place, wherein I got lost looking for the convention center. I managed to find it after about 3 minutes - I realized one has to take about 2 floors up to find the convention center as the street level of this place is the mall.  After that small incident, I found it easy to navigate this place and marveled at how this building has varied designs and architecture. I especially like the garden design I saw in one part of this place.I wasn’t sure what to find, and after visiting thru I can tell you that the artistic side of it is great!
Sculptures, the World Trade Center buildings, hotels, restaurants and the Hyundai shopping mall, makes a big complex to be discovered.Coex complex is one of the most popular tourist destination located in downtown area of Seoul. Asia's biggest underground shopping mall (Coex Mall), Duty-free shop, Department Store, Casino, Book Store, Kimchi Musem, Traditional Buddist Temple, Cinema, Musical Theater and other facilities and amenities designed to provide memorable tourist experience are all located in one place, Intercontinental Seul is adjacent to Coex complex .I lived in Seoul for five years and went back to visit after eight years away. The Coex Mall has been remodeled and it is overwhelming. I'm sure Koreans love to go here but it was too confusing for a short visit.It is worth to visit. There are lots of shops. If you are in search for a place with more reasonably priced items. This place is not for you.5 more hours for the driver to arrive for the airport from Gangnam. Took the subway to COEX.nice cafe "mamas" at the entrance of the subway which led to the mall.Eateries are aplenty, but prices are definitely upmarket though not expensive per se.The Aquarium and a couple of Korean popstars exhibits and themed museum are all within the huge building, co-joining the exhibition halls, as well as the Hotel Inter-continental.A good walk for 2-3hra is recommended, esp if the outdoors too hot, or raining.

Name: 봉은사
Review: This is an active temple with worshipers. The architecture is interesting and worth a visit. It will not take very long to visit the property.this temple in the middle of the city across the Intercontinental COEX hotel, is amazing; you will be surprised by the calm and serenity of this place; take a walk around and feel the power of this place;The temple is easily accessible by subway. It is located just across the road from COEX (where the aquarium is). Lovely temple with big Buddha statue. Just as I entered the temple, a magpie stopped in front of me. Did not miss the chance to take its photo. There is a small tea-shop for the visitors; from there one could just relax and view the city from its balcony.Literally across the street from the massive convention centre is this place of peace and quiet surrounded by the city. Great history and architecture,nice walks in the woods. Current construction on the site distracts a little but it's still easy to find a quiet place to pray (for Buddhists) and a peaceful escape for everyone else.This temple is just next to Coex center. It is at a hill side. Though next to busy business buildings, this place is surprisingly quiet. Few people came during the noon when I visited. There are a few buildings there and takes some climbing to see them. It is a good place if you want to escape from busy life around it for a while.Beautiful temple that has a lot to explore. Little bit of uphill walking involved but it was great to see.Its just opposite the Coex Mall by walking distance and no entrance ticket needed.There is alot of people praying here as well.A great place to visit during your stay in Seoul. There are very old pictures that are Naitonal treasures, and other monuments to see.A must to see.Stumbled on this the last day I was in Seoul. Right near the hotel, didn't even know it was here. You can walk around the temple and even stay at night if you'd like. It feels very calm and relaxing even though it is surrounded by city. Love the old and refurbished architecture.We stopped to take in some living culture - be aware, this is a practicing temple, people go there to pray and reflect, so bring your best behavior! I can't tell you how many noisy, annoying tourists we saw! For us, we simply walked the grounds, sat in the shade, and spoke quietly in whispers about the rituals and what we were experiencing. It seems as though the temple is undergoing a massive overhaul of their buildings and reorganization of the entry/grounds. Lots of orange cones, construction equipment, and scaffolding everywhere, but we'll probably go back on our next journey to see the completion.

Name: 마르지아힐링스파 청담점
Review: I get regular sugaring treatments done at Marzia every month and each visit is amazing! The owner Yoon is very kind, professional and knowledgeable and is always accommodating! She also speaks perfect English. The spa itself is very clean and the products they use are all natural and gentle. Highly recommend this spa!In late March, my sister-in-law and I were in Seoul for a few days and wanted to get a facial. After researching a number of places, we decided on Chungdam Marzia Healing Spa. We had a great experience and I highly recommend this place.The owner Yoon speaks excellent English and was very professional. She did not try to sell us anything, which we appreciated.We had the couples room. Both of us got the Cromo facial and was relaxing overall.They just moved at the time and are now by the Gangnamgu Office subway station. Yoon provided excellent directions.I am a regular customer at Marzia. I have been going back because the treatment is great and I feel relaxed every time after my visit. The staff is very nice and attentive. They are also very knowledgeable and can recommend treatment / products that best suit your condition. Never pushy to sell products. Great experience, highly recommend if you are looking for a place in Seoul for a good facial treatment. Also, staff speaks perfect English, so that's helpful!Went for a scalp treatment and didnt think much of it, just wanted to see what its all about. Was pleasantly surprised! Its not just lie down and get the treatment. From the minute you walk in the manager/owner greets you and the atmosphere and professionalism is top quality. Even the dimmed lights and the relaxing music on top of the actual treatment made the experience special! Had a talk with the owner, shes educated in England and test all products herself for at least 3-6 months before using them on clients. Talk about care and commitment! Highly recommendedWhy didn't I come here in my first day! Why why why. I am leaving Seoul tomorrow! The place is so clean. The products is so pure. Non of the cancer causing ingredients. The Boss, Miss Un makes the best lemon tea in the world! She is not open on Sundays. I have to come back to Seoul again. I took some pictures for those who are not observant. It's a bit difficult to spot. Do look out for the sign hanging from the building frontage. I feel strong to handle the weekend rush in Seoul after my body scrub and massage. Do try the shampoo in the shower. Thank you Marzia Clinic.I had a wonderful experience at Marzial Spa. Mme Oh, the owner is very nice and her english is perfect so she explained to me all the different treatment available. Then I had 1:30 of massage with good products. I wish I could go there everyday :)

Name: 선릉과 정릉
Review:
I went because is declarared by Unesco... But little people only now english... No one spanish... Al the beautiful sculpture and information Are in korean only,1000 krw. Beautiful green oasis in the middle of buzzing metropol. Three tombs of royals, good info, peaceful area, nice trails and nice spots with benches where relax and enjoy.One of my favorite places in Gangnam to take a walk and escape the crowds and modernity. Seolleung Royal Tombs aka Seonjeongeung is the burial place of King Seongjong and his second wife Queen Jeong Hyeon and the King’s second son King Jungjong.
‘Seonjeongeung’ comes...더 보기The tomb is located in the middle of Gangnam area so it is very easy to visit if you are happen to stay in one of the many hotels within the territory. It covers a very vast and hilly area so you better wear convenient...더 보기I'm from Seoul but I have never been here before. I found out such a silent spot and it was!...더 보기I enjoyed walking around this place so much! Very beautiful park with great landscape and Korean pines. Plus, of course, a place of history and spiritual significance. Wonderful atmosphere of tranquility and peace.This was a nice way to spend a couple hours. Very cheap to get in (1,000 won). They provide you with an English brochure. Tombs aren’t terribly exciting but the park itself is beautiful and it is hard to believe it is in the middle...더 보기It was autumn when we went to the Royal tombs, there were 8 tombs in form of hills. A peaceful place to visit.The tombs were a five minute walk from my hotel. I went around 0800 on a weekday and there were a lot of elderly Koreans getting in their morning excercise. The tombs were very interesting with stone guards at the top of the mound. You...더 보기The location is easy to get to if you take public transportation, metro or a vehicle. The park is not very busy and does not seem to have peak hours. The entire place can be toured in about 30 minutes to a hour.
Admission for...더 보기

Name: 가로수길
Review:
お<U+6D12>落なストリ<U+30FC>トだけあって、街路樹には毛<U+7CF8>で編んだ、防寒着が<U+5DFB>かれていてとてもかわいかったです。お店も通る人もとてもお<U+6D12>落。ゆっくりと、ウィンド<U+30FC>ショッピングを<U+697D>しみたい場所です。何度も行ってる カロスキル。最近の流行りを眺めたり、ポップアップストアがあったり、大人もぶらぶらショッピングするのも<U+697D>しめる街。そして、たまに芸能人も普通に<U+4F1A>えたりするところ今回の旅で こんなに街路樹が可愛らしく<U+5909>身してて お散<U+6B69>してても<U+697D>しくなりましたアクリル毛<U+7CF8>でポップにデコレ<U+30FC>ションかなり良かったです。美しい方がたくさんいました。ありがとうございます。良かったです。おすすめです<U+30FC>よ期待していたほど面白いエリアではなかった
高級店が多いので買うものがない
何もすることもなく立ち去った、、、ソウル地下<U+9244>（メトロ）3<U+53F7>線新沙（シンサ）<U+99C5>8番出口から狎<U+9D0E>亭（アックジョン）方面へのびるおしゃれな通りで、カフェやブティックなどが立ちならぶ。ソウルのほかの繁華街に比べても落ち着いた雰<U+56F2><U+6C17>で、ゆっくり散策を<U+697D>しむことができる。近年新沙（シンサ）<U+99C5>前にド<U+30FC>ミ<U+30FC>インホテルができたので、夜<U+9045>い時間<U+5E2F>でも散策できるようになった。通りの入口にマクドナルドがあり、タッチパネルで注文し英語とクレジットカ<U+30FC>ドに<U+5BFE><U+5FDC>している。また、注文時にポテトやドリンクのサイズを指定できるほか、マスタ<U+30FC>ド<U+30FB>ピクルス<U+30FB>オニオンなどの有無を指定することもできる。いわゆるバリュ<U+30FC>セットの値段は日本よりも安めである。韓<U+56FD>のマクドナルドは韓<U+56FD>ならではのプルコギバ<U+30FC>ガ<U+30FC>もあるので、ハンバ<U+30FC>ガ<U+30FC>好きな人にはぜひおすすめである。☆ソウルは色<U+3005>なエリアで品<U+63C3>えが違いますが、カロスキルは感度の高いトレンド服が多くカフェもオシャレカフェが多いです。他のエリアと比較して<U+5199><U+771F>映えするショップが<U+6CA2>山あるので見るだけでも<U+697D>しめます！ただ土地代が高いのかお値段はお高めです。お得にショッピングを<U+697D>しみたいなら7月がセ<U+30FC>ル時期なので感度の良い服が安く買えます！可愛いカフェが充<U+5B9F>しています♪また、ALAND、indibrand、3ce、SAPPUN、8seconds、artbox、LOHB、olive youngなど定番のお店や、セレクトショップなどもあります♪最近は工事が多く、お店の入れ替わりが激しかったので、お目<U+5F53>てのカフェやショップがある場合は最新の情報をチェックしてから行かれることをオススメします！すごく人が多いわけではなく、程よく人がいる感じでした。お店も<U+4E26>んでいるし見やすいです。途中途中では、オシャレなカフェもあって休憩しながらブラブラできます。またゆっくり見に<U+6765>たいです。ミョウドンとはまた違った<U+697D>しさがある通りです。表<U+53C2>道の通りくらいの長さでしょうか？表<U+53C2>道の通りからハイブランドをなくしたらこんな感じなのかな？と思います。ミョウドンの<U+4FA1>格に慣れてしまうとちょっとお高いイメ<U+30FC>ジを持たれてしまいますが、セレクトショップが<U+4E26>ぶのでお買い物はしやすいです。疲れたらカフェへ。お<U+6D12>落なカフェがけっこうあります。カフェ巡りも<U+697D>しいですね。オシャレな街でした。
ただ、店がわかりずらかったのが<U+6B8B>念ですが、次はきちんと調べてから行きたいと思います。

Name: 압구정 로데오 거리
Review: 明洞の<U+96D1>踏が苦手でこちらの地域を<U+6B69>きました。迷いながらも<U+697D>しんで<U+6B69>くことをお<U+52E7>めします。規模は<U+5E83>くないので狎<U+9D0E>亭<U+99C5>から<U+6B69>いても逆からでもいいと思います。この街にある「ル<U+30FB>チャンバ<U+30FC>」というバ<U+30FC>が<U+6C17>に入っていてよく<U+98F2>みに行っています。本棚にある本のどれかを手に取ると扉が開くという秘密のバ<U+30FC>です。カロスギル（街路樹通り）よりも<U+9759>かな雰<U+56F2><U+6C17>が良いです。明洞の<U+96D1>踏を期待すると肩透かしを<U+55B0>らいます。世界展開している大衆的なブランドとナショナル系のブランドが程よくミックスされていてバランスが良いのがgood。ソウル地下<U+9244>（メトロ）狎<U+9D0E>亭（アックジョン）ロデオ<U+99C5>5番出口から3<U+53F7>線狎<U+9D0E>亭（アックジョン）<U+99C5>方面へ<U+5E83>がるおしゃれな繁華街で、規模は大きくないが道路が入り組んでいて迷いやすい。無料の公衆無線LANとスマ<U+30FC>トフォンの地<U+56F3>アプリを利用して現在位置と目的地を確認するとよい。繁華街にはカレ<U+30FC>ハウスの「ココイチ」があり、日本<U+56FD><U+5185>のココイチとほぼ同じメニュ<U+30FC>で注文することができるが、値段はやや高めである。チェ<U+30FC>ン店であるがカフェと同<U+69D8>にタッチパネルではなく店員に直接注文し、簡<U+5358>な英語とクレジットカ<U+30FC>ドに<U+5BFE><U+5FDC>している（メニュ<U+30FC>は日本語で書かれているので指差しでOK）。☆今回は感度の高いセレクトショップの10corso comoとミシュランのピブグルマン(<U+4FA1>格が安いのに<U+6E80>足度の高い店)をとったス<U+30FC>プ餃子の<U+96A0>れた名店マンドゥチへ。(興味のある方は各お店の口コミをご確認下さいませ。)ソウルは何回も訪れていますが<U+6BCE>回時間が無く初じめて狎<U+9D0E>亭ロデオ通りに<U+6765>ました。道も<U+5E83>いしショップやレストランも多く<U+697D>しめました！狎<U+9D0E>亭ロデオ<U+99C5>から5分ぐらい。受付で見たいエリアを選びます。ネオンがたくさんあるkissのエリアに入りました。他の方はカップルが多かったですが、空いていたので<U+5199><U+771F>撮り放題で<U+697D>しめました。狎<U+9D0E>亭ロデオ<U+99C5>は比較的新しい<U+99C5>だと思います。<U+6570>年前に<U+6765>た時には無かったような。ロデオ通りまで15分から20分は<U+6B69>いた記憶があります。なので今は狎<U+9D0E>亭散策も便利になりました。ロデオ通りもすぐです。 以前は平日夜も賑わっていましたが今回は春休み期間中にも<U+95A2>わらず人が少なかったのが印象的です。流行りの問題なのかな。近くに芸能事務所や有名デパ<U+30FC>トがあるので、運がよけれな芸能人を見かけることもあります。カフェや、お<U+6D12>落な洋服やさんもありますし、おいしいお店もあり、私は<U+713C>き肉屋さんが大好きです。サンボンファログイというお店は、タレが最高においしく、2人で５人前ほど注文してもペロリと食べれてしまいます。それもお肉が薄いので、食べられちゃうんです。そんな話題のお店があるロデオ通りですが、不定期？なのか、たまにおじいさんが昔<U+61D0>かしい、カルメ<U+713C>き？をつくっているようです。たまたまタイミングが合い、購入しましたが、おじいさんが作っている光景は、若い世代が見ても、どこか<U+61D0>かしく、買いたくなってしまいます。時代が進んでも、このような昔とのふれあいができる、素敵な通りだなと思いました。ラグジュアリ<U+30FC>ブランドやスポ<U+30FC>ツブランドの店<U+8217>がずらっと建ち<U+4E26>んでいたり、サムギョプサル、カフェなど<U+98F2>食のお店が建ち<U+4E26>んでいたりと、エリアで雰<U+56F2><U+6C17>が違います。夜の訪問でア<U+30FC>ティストのモニュメントを撮りに行ってきました。<U+8D14><U+5C53>グル<U+30FC>プしか撮っていませんが、<U+663C>間は違った雰<U+56F2><U+6C17>が<U+697D>しめるようですよ。行ってみたいレストランがあったため、こちらに訪問しました。ギャラリア百貨店は品<U+63C3>えも良く、ゆっくりとお買い物でできたので良かったです。

Name: 현대백화점 압구정본점
Review: 韓<U+56FD>の高級百貨店のひとつですが同じApgujeongにあるギャラリアデパ<U+30FC>トと比べると比較的庶民的テパ<U+30FC>トいえるでしょう。外<U+89B3>は神殿を思わせる建物です。地下1Fがグルメ、いわゆるデパ地下。客も多く活<U+6C17>があります。地下1Fが<U+96D1>貨、子供服。1F～4Fが海外ブランドやコスメ。5Fがレストラン。韓<U+56FD><U+56FD><U+5185>ブランド服のフロアはどこなのかよくわかりませんでしたが…規模が小さいので見やすいことは見やすいです。地下1階の食品<U+58F2>り場の<U+5965>に、韓<U+56FD>のりなどお土産が買えます。試食できるので、安心です。買い物袋は持<U+53C2>した方が良いです。ビニ<U+30FC>ル袋にしても紙袋にしても有料でした。韓<U+56FD>には何度もきてますが、こちらを利用する事は少ないです。ただ、こちらのデパ地下の食材はオリジナル商品もあるのでおすすめです。フ<U+30FC>ドコ<U+30FC>ト目的で訪問。料理も店の種類もギャレリアの方が<U+65AD>然良い!と思っている。高級かもしれないけれど、他の人には薦めないかな…デパ地下目<U+5F53>てで行きました。韓<U+56FD>の高級食材がたくさんあって、買いたかったのですが、まだ<U+89B3>光途中だったので<U+65AD>念。ス<U+30FC>パ<U+30FC>で買うものとは品物が違うので、一見の<U+4FA1>値があります。比較的に他のデパ<U+30FC>トに比べると規模が小さなデパ<U+30FC>トなので、近くの地元の人が使用しているのが見受けられます。小さなデパ<U+30FC>トなので買い物しやすく、わたしは<U+6C17>にいっています。狎<U+9D0E>亭に<U+6765>たついでに立ち寄って見ました。平日は<U+9759>かでゆっくり買い物ができると思います。また狎<U+9D0E>亭だけあり、外<U+56FD>籍の方も<U+6CA2>山見られました。ギャラリア百貨店とはまた違う品<U+63C3>えで、地下のフ<U+30FC>ドコ<U+30FC>ナ<U+30FC>には意外とセ<U+30FC>ルの品物もあり、お土産選びも<U+697D>しめました。明洞にある百貨店は人があふれていますが、ここは<U+89B3>光客があまりいないのでゆっくりショッピングできました。<U+99C5>直結なのも便利です。地下の食料品<U+58F2>り場も<U+697D>しいです。大きくてキレイな百貨店だった。デパ地下は美味しそうなスイ<U+30FC>ツやパンのお店がずらりと<U+4E26>んでいてまるで日本のデパ地下だった。化粧品<U+58F2>り場も韓<U+56FD>コスメが充<U+5B9F>していて<U+697D>しい。

Name: 스트레치 엔젤스 가로수길 플래그쉽 스토어
Review: While walking around in Sinsa, I decided to pop into Stretch Angels attracted by its colorful facade. I really liked the interiors of the store. The interior decor is really interesting and cleverly designed.
